text: kisee manushy kee yah shaan nahin ki allaah usase baat kare, sivaay isake ki prakaashana ke dvaara ya parade ke peechhe se (baat kare) . ya yah ki vah ek rasool (farishta) bhej de, phir vah usakee anugya se jo kuchh vah chaahata hai prakaashana kar de. nishchay hee vah sarvochch atyant tatvadarshee hai
